sli.name: user-api_uptime_ratio
sli.help: The ratio of time the user-api service was up and reachable over the specified time window.

sli.name: user-api_request_error_rate
sli.help: The rate at which requests to the user-api service resulted in errors over the specified time window. Errors are defined as responses with HTTP status codes outside the 200 range.

llm_suggestions: Consider adding latency SLIs for comprehensive performance tracking.
Set up burn-rate alerts to catch SLO violations early.
